name: Punch Rush Simulator
description:
This game is played using only the left mouse button.

You have 5 seconds to punch a dummy as much as possible, then send it off with a single finishing blow.

Assets stolen:

Various sound effects from JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Stardust Crusaders and JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: All star battle

Song "Stardust Crusaders" from JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Stardust Crusaders
